enchantment.translatable.death_as_home.u: Death as Home: Resist fatal damage once
item.more_enchantments.container_of_hear: A gem imbued with the essence of life
Right-click to restore a small amount of health
command.more_enchantment.me.info.title: More Enchantment - Additional Enchantments
command.more_enchantment.me.info.context: Add more enchanted books to the original Minecraft
command.more_enchantment.me.info.enchant: Blessed Recovery

Applicable to: Swords, Axes
Attacking creatures randomly restores own health, with a chance to trigger special effects and fully restore health
Heavy Blow

Applicable to: Axes
Attacking creatures inflicts a slow effect, with stronger effects at higher levels
Satiety

Applicable to: Swords
Attacking creatures has a one-fifth chance to restore one hunger point to oneself
Soul Penetration

Applicable to: Swords, Axes
Ignore armor value to deal additional damage. The higher the weapon's enchantment damage, the higher the damage to the penetrated soul. Also, the higher the opponent's armor, the higher the damage dealt
Disarm

Applicable to: Swords
Attacking hostile creatures makes them drop the item they are holding
Leech

Applicable to: Swords
Damage dealt to creatures restores own health based on the enchantment level
Diamonds Everywhere

Applicable to: Pickaxes
Mining certain minerals has a chance to drop diamonds. Influenced by Fortune, there is a chance to drop more diamonds
Vibrant Health

Applicable to: Chestplates
Increases the wearer's maximum health, with each level adding two health points. Starts with two health points
Touch Of Midas

Applicable to: Pickaxes
Mining certain stones has a chance to drop gold nuggets
Arrow Shield

Applicable to: Helmets
Being shot by arrows increases resistance
Kiss Of Death

Applicable to: Swords
Killing creatures infects nearby creatures of the same type with random negative effects
Heart Container

Applicable to: Swords
Defeating creatures drops a Heart Container. Right-clicking restores a small amount of health
Benevolence

Applicable to: Swords
Weapons enchanted with this cannot deal any damage to opponents
Tetanus Blade

Applicable to: Swords, Axes
Creatures and players attacked have a low chance of contracting tetanus, randomly losing health for 6 seconds until death
Absolute Immunity

Applicable to: Chestplates
Chance to be immune to one instance of damage, with the probability increasing with enchantment level
Death As Home

Applicable to: Chestplates
Immunity to one fatal blow, with a 75-second cooldown
Area Destruction

Applicable to: Pickaxes
Increases the excavation range of the pickaxe tool (3 * 3), at the cost of 3 durability points
